(* 
Author: Pieter van Baal, Oktober 2004

- Dutch disability weights derived in the......
- The first row contains the disease name.
- The second row contains the disability weights for a disease for males by 5-year age class, rest class 85+. 
- The third row contains the disability weights for a disease for females by 5-year age class, rest class 85+.
- More details about costs and economic evaluations with the CZM can be found in Technical Report??
*)

Div: 1
